aboutpara: Junior Software Developer, recently graduated from Generation Bootcamp with 3 years of experience in architecture engineering and construction (software). Proficient in MERN stack, Dynamo, and Python. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, agile, and a quick learner. Experienced in web development and RESTful APIs. Proven ability to enhance team efficiency and productivity through streamlined processes. Seeking a challenging role in a BIM environment, focusing on BIM data management and integration. Eager to join a company that values growth and passion, where I can work with agile teams, adhere to high-quality standards, design and implement end-to-end systems, and analyze and resolve technical applications.
name: Chatpong Deepet

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Conducted time assessments for file development, ensuring efficient and timely project delivery., Played a pivotal role in establishing and implementing the standard for BIM object development., Developed plug-ins and Dynamo scripts to facilitate quality control processes before client submissions., Led the creation of fully parametric Revit families, contributing to the versatility and adaptability of project assets
